document.full_text: search parties scouring the sea bed off brazil's northeast coast have recovered the second of two flight recorders from the air france aircraft that crashed into the atlantic in june 2009, investigators said on tuesday.
document.title: searchers find second air france crash black box
lines_and_colors: search parties scouring the sea bed off brazil's northeast coast have recovered the second of two flight recorders from the air france aircraft that crashed into the atlantic in june 2009, investigators said on tuesday.
